abstract: As companies prepare for a new season of investor updates, they would do well to consider a recent conference call by General Electric‘s Jeffrey Immelt, Jack Flack says.
snippet: As companies prepare for a new season of investor updates, they would do well to consider a recent conference call by General Electric‘s Jeffrey Immelt, Jack Flack says.
lead_paragraph: We are only a few days into January, which means the Year-End Spin Season will soon be upon us, with the traditional parade of fourth-quarter earnings conference calls and annual investor update meetings.

headline.main: Learning From G.E. as Spin Season Approaches
